about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Rene Krajnc, a Web Developer with a passion for building impactful digital solutions. My journey began transitioning from an infantry soldier to a software engineer, and I've since gained experience in a variety of technologies and industries. I enjoy tackling complex problems and continuously learning new skills.

contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology and development. Feel free to reach out through email or connect with me on social media.
